<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NVPTXImageOptimizer::replaceWith(Instruction &#42;From, ConstantInt &#42;To) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We implement &quot;poor man&#39;s DCE&quot; here to make sure any code that is no longer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// live is actually unreachable and can be trivially eliminated by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unreachable block elimination pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Use &amp;U : From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#abf855b7cd63a0cd7f73759e396f280c9">uses</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BranchInst &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;isUnconditional()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Dest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (To-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#a882d55a6aa2028e1a5ad708b275334e0">isZero</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get false block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dest = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get true block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dest = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a9f40e42226cee617c16cb1c447b115c5">BranchInst::Create</a>(Dest, BI-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstrToDelete.push&#95;back(BI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(To);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InstrToDelete.push&#95;back(From);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
